questions.question: This popular open source tool is used to discover hosts and services on a computer network
This type of attack is commonly performed with the text ' or '1'='1' --
A flaw that occurs whenever an application takes untrusted data and sends it to a web browser without proper validation or escaping.
This not-for-profit organization famously publishes a top-10 list of software vulnerabilities.
questions.answer: OWASP (The Open Web Application Security Project)

questions.question: NMAP supports this type of output in addition to its Interactive, XML, Grepable, and normal modes
